welcome.title: Welcome to Beancounter!
welcome.description: Let's set up your account in a few quick steps. We'll help you create your first portfolio and add your accounts.
welcome.skipNote: You can skip this setup and complete it later from settings.

currency.title: Set your currencies
currency.description: Choose your base currency for cost tracking and your reporting currency for displaying values.
currency.baseDescription: Used for cost tracking and as the default jurisdiction for new portfolios.
currency.reportingDescription: The currency used to display portfolio values and reports.
currency.useSame: Use the same currency for reporting values

portfolio.title: Name your first portfolio
portfolio.description: A portfolio groups your investments together. You might have separate portfolios for different goals like retirement, savings, or trading.
portfolio.label: Portfolio Name
portfolio.hint: Example: Personal Investments, Retirement Fund, Trading Account

assets.title: Add your accounts
assets.description: Add bank accounts and property to track your complete wealth. This step is optional - you can add these later.
assets.propertyHint: Leave current value blank to use purchase price

independence.title: Quick Independence Check
independence.description: Want to see how your finances might look in retirement? Just three quick questions.
independence.hint: A plan called "My Independence Plan" will be created with sensible defaults. You can refine it anytime from the Independence page.
independence.skipHint: No worries! You can create an independence plan anytime from the menu.

complete.title: You're all set!
complete.description: Your account has been set up successfully. Here's what was created:
complete.csvDescription: Download our example CSV to see the format for importing transactions like deposits and stock purchases.
